mapper.select: select GK_NUM, GK_KIND from GOODS_KIND order by GK_NUM asc
select DK_CODE, DK_NAME from DEVICE_KIND order by DK_CODE asc
select GC_CODE, GC_COLOR from GOODS_COLOR order by GC_CODE asc
mapper.insert: insert into goods(G_NUM, G_NAME, G_COUNT, G_PRICE, G_SELLCOUNT, G_CONTENT, G_DISCOUNT, G_PHOTO, G_SAVEFILENAME) values(#{G_NUM}, #{G_NAME}, 0, #{G_PRICE}, 0, #{G_CONTENT}, #{G_DISCOUNT}, #{G_PHOTO}, #{G_SAVEFILENAME})
insert into goods_detail(GD_NUM, GD_CODE, GD_KIND_NUM, GD_DEVICE, GD_COLOR, GD_COUNT, GD_SELLCOUNT) values(#{GD_NUM}, #{GD_CODE}, #{GD_KIND_NUM}, #{GD_DEVICE}, #{GD_COLOR}, #{GD_COUNT}, 0)
mapper.update: update Goods set G_COUNT = #{G_COUNT} where G_NUM = #{G_NUM}
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from GOODS where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
mapper.update: update GOODS set G_NAME=#{G_NAME}, G_PRICE=#{G_PRICE}, G_CONTENT=#{G_CONTENT}, G_DISCOUNT=#{G_DISCOUNT}, G_PHOTO=#{G_PHOTO}, G_SAVEFILENAME=#{G_SAVEFILENAME} where G_NUM=#{G_NUM}
